dublin_core.dcvalue: In order to take the full advantage of telemedicine applications they must seamlessly be integrated into healthcare services and their information systems e g HIS POS RIS In our approach an HL7 XML based integration module is used 1 to exchange documents with information systems 2 to generate and administer documents internally 3 to present documents The module fills in pre defined CDA conforming XML templates with data from HL7 V2 messages The approach is first applied to the teleconsultation service EST in the project ENDOTEL
Studies in health technology and informatics
A new approach for integration of telemedicine applications into existing information systems in healthcare.
